question.text: The concept of chemical evolution is based on

options.text: Interaction of water, air and clay under intense heat
Effect of solar radiation on chemicals
Possible origin of life by combination of chemicals under suitable environmental conditions

solution.text: The concept of chemical evolution is based on possible origin of life by combination of chemicals under suitable environmental conditions. The distribution of elements in the cosmos is the result of many processes in the history of the Universe. It provides us with a powerful tool to study the Big Bang, the density of baryonic matter, nucleosynthesis and the formation and evolution of stars and galaxies.
